entry.title: Essential Oil Wallet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 6.50

Take your favourite oils with you!

A well made nylon essential oil wallet. Each EO wallet will hold 10 mini bottles or use every other compartment for bigger bottles or ignore the compartments and use it to carry one or 2 of you all time fave oils!

entry.title: Fragrance Oil - 15mls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 5.85

These Fragrance Oils are specifically formulated for both skin and hair care formulations and are suitable for soaps and candles. Scents are extremely rich, complex, and long-lasting. Fragrance Oils are synthetically compounded, and should not be confused with the 100% natural Essential Oils used in Aromatherapy. Please note that these Fragrance Oils are all paraben-free and phthalate-free which makes them safer for you and the environment, but may give a slightly milder throw in soaps and candles. Full MSDS, CofA, and quality information upon request.

All Fragrance Oils are sold in cobalt with a dropper or amber drip tops 15ml glass bottles

CHRISTMAS  EVE - A wonderful abundance of festive fruits mixed with the warmth of cinnamon. Top notes of sweet cherry, strawberry, and apple. A swirl of cinnamon and peach mid notes. The fragrance is completed with violet, powder, and vanilla base notes. Origin USA

WOODLAND THEME - A fresh, warm woody fragrance. Ozone floral top notes with citrus and balsam. Heart notes of spice, cedarwood, and eucalyptus. Musk and moss at the base. Origin USA

APPLE GREEN - A delightful mix of fruity floral and crisp green apple. Top notes of green apple, crisp citrus, and nuances of Berries. Peach mid notes reaching into a light musk at the base of the fragrance. Origin USA

MOUNTAIN RAIN - Crisp, light, clean fragrance of pristine mountain air after the rain. Soft floral undertones mingle with juicy citrus, and hints of pine and musk to create this wonderful scent. Origin USA

WATERMELON - A fresh, ripe, juicy watermelon fragrance. Top notes of watermelon, strawberry, and pineapple. Mid notes of floral and sweet peach. Musk, vanilla, and powder note complete this fragrance. Origin USA

MAPLE SUGAR - Enjoy the aroma of sweet, warm maple sugar and butter. This scent is extremely rich, complex, and long-lasting.

HIS URBAN BEAT - A woody-masculine fragrance like Abercrombie & Fitch Fierce Type, with top-notes of lemon, lime, and a splash of orange, middle-notes of petitgrain, cardamom, rosemary, lily of the valley, jasmine, and rose, and base notes of amber, white musk, fir, vetiver, oakmoss, and rosewood. Origin USA

PEPPERMINT - Refreshing! Strong minty notes with herbaceous and fresh camphoraceous undertones. Origin China

ORANGE CREAMSICLE - It's a delicious, creamy, fruity sensation. Top notes of ozone floral, muguet, pineapple, and sweet orange. Lilac and juicy peach mid notes. Musk, powder, and vanilla at the base.

COFFEE CAKE & SPICE - A rich, buttery coffee cake with fragrant spices. Buttery top notes with nuances of jasmine. Sweet, juicy, floral mid notes with cinnamon. The fragrance comes to a well-rounded finish with nutty, powder, and vanilla notes at the base. Origin USA

LEMONGRASS VERBENA - This fragrance has a fresh lemony scent capped off with lingering herbaceous undertones.

EUCALYPTUS SPEARMINT - A refreshing twist of eucalyptus and spearmint with lime-like minty top notes and base notes of patchouli and light musk.

CINNAMON BUN - A spicy and sweet sticky-bun pastry type fragrant oil with nutmeg, ginger, and cinnamon rounded out with a rich sugary caramelized base with hints of vanilla bean.

CRANBERRY PEACH VANILLA - A sweet, delicious medley of fruits and vanilla. Top notes of sweet peach, berries with nuances of banana. Heart notes of juicy cranberries, jasmine with a hint of pineapples. Vanilla and light musk at the base.

 BUBBLEGUM - A sweet, juicy bubble gum scent. Notes of fresh berries, peach, pineapple, and citrus complete this fragrance. Smells just like Juicy Fruit Gum.

LEMON BLOSSOM - A zesty citrus delight. This wonderful fresh, light lemon scent is a must-have! Top notes of lemon, lime, muguet, and green herbaceous. Soft powdery base notes. origin USA

FRUIT SLICES - A bevy of sweet, succulent fruits. Top notes of citrus and pineapple. Middles notes of peach with nuances of berries leading to a green note at the base. Origin USA

BAMBOO TEAK - A rich and luxurious aroma with hints of sandalwood, cedarwood, musk, floral and sweet fruit. A great addition to any collection. Origin USA

OAK BARREL CIDER - An abundance of fruits and spices add pizazz to this fragrance. Top notes of tart apples and strawberries blend well with a swirl of cinnamon and allspice at the heart. This fragrance is completed with violet, powder, and vanilla base notes. Origin USA

ORANGE GINGER - Boost your energy with the refreshing scent of orange and ginger. Top notes of sweet orange, ozone, and melon blends well with heart notes of hyacinth, rose, and peach. A light musk at the base completes the fragrance.

BAHAMA BERRY & MELON - Ripe, sweet berries, and succulent melons combine to form this unique fragrance. Top notes of citrus, berries with nuances of pineapple. Sweet peach, honeydew melon, and jasmine are at the heart. A whisper of musk at the base.

CHAMPAKA (NAG CHAMPA) - A light, delicate floral, fresh air fragrance. Top notes of ozone, muguet and champaka. Heart notes of jasmine, delicate rose and lily of the valley. Powder and light musk at the base.

CITRUS MIST - A zesty, citrus delight. Top notes of ozone floral, muguet, green, orange, lemon and lime. Mid notes of jasmine, rose, camphor and eucalyptus. Violet at the base of the fragrance.

COCONUT PARADISE - A zesty, citrus delight. Top notes of ozone floral, muguet, green, orange, lemon and lime. Mid notes of jasmine, rose, camphor and eucalyptus. Violet at the base of the fragrance.

entry.title: Horse Car Vent Diffuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 8.90

Horse lovers will love this! It's practical and pretty with a little extra bling.

This diffuser comes with 3 felt pads (mixed colours - may not be the colours shown), ideally, you assign a colour to each fragrance you enjoy. These sell very well at shows. You will find similar styles (although not as nice in my opinion) selling for $40 on Etsy.

This diffuser features a long clip that is lined with a rubber material to clip onto the air vents in your car without causing any damage.

Aromatherapy is current and a great way to benefit from essential oils no matter where you are. I'm hoping it will make my stinky ole farm jeep smell better too!

Stainless steel. The diffuser is 30mm with magnetic closures and a felt pad inside to put a few drops of oil on as needed.

entry.title: Essential Oil Diffuser Necklace - Violet - #2
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 8.90

This necklace comes with 5 felt pads (mixed colours - may not be the colours shown), ideally, you assign a colour to each fragrance you enjoy.  These sell very well at shows. You will find similar styles (although not as nice in my opinion) selling for $40 on Etsy.

Aromatherapy jewellery is a modern and great way to benefit from essential oils no matter where you are.

Surgical grade stainless steel. The pendant is a 30mm locket with magnetic closures and a felt pad inside to put a few drops of oil on as needed.
